mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coupon A WHERE A.coupon_cd NOT IN (SELECT Z.coupon_cd FROM coupon_paid_history Z WHERE Z.coupon_paid_user_id = #{coupon_paid_user_id}) AND SYSDATE() BETWEEN A.coupon_valid_date_start AND date_add(A.coupon_valid_date_end, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND (A.coupon_issue_date IS NULL OR SYSDATE() > A.coupon_issue_date) AND A.coupon_condition NOT IN ('T','L','M')
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_paid_history( coupon_cd, coupon_paid_user_id) VALUES ( #{coupon_cd}, #{coupon_paid_user_id} )
